sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('SELECT ',
    pipeline().parameters.P_SELECT_COLUMN,
    ' FROM ',
    pipeline().parameters.P_SYSTEM,
    '.',
    pipeline().parameters.P_SCHEMA,
    '.',
    pipeline().parameters.P_TABLENAME,
    ' WHERE ',
    pipeline().parameters.P_WATERMARK_COLUMN,
    ' > ',
    '''',
    pipeline().parameters.P_WATERMARK,
    ''''
)

@concat('SELECT ',    
    pipeline().parameters.P_SELECT_COLUMN,
    ' FROM [',
    
    pipeline().parameters.P_SYSTEM,
    '].[',
    pipeline().parameters.P_SCHEMA,
    '].[',
    pipeline().parameters.P_TABLENAME,
    '] WHERE ',
    pipeline().parameters.P_WATERMARK_COLUMN,
    ' > ',
    '''',
    pipeline().parameters.P_WATERMARK,
    ''''
)
